title: Vintage serif font
content:
Hello all

Have you got a idea of what is this font?

[vintage font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826024305/http:/i148.photobucket.com/albums/s6/rubyredgun/LAETITIACOVER2.jpg)

It may be customised but I think I often saw it.

I looked and the closest that I found was this, but too dirty and no ligatures...

thanx in advance :)

baz
author: baz the baz

comments.content:
Bookman Swash based on ATF Bookman.

Try [Jukebox Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826024305/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085).
Bookman w/Swashes revived as [Bookman Complete](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826024305/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000085#flont) by Jason Walcott.

Wow I'm impressed!

I'll look for that, thank you :)

I also found this one, close to what I was looking for, for those interested!

[Latienne Swash Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826024305/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/latienne/urw-swash-t-medium/)

The characters have not the same shape but it has a lot of swashes
